name: LAKMÉ 9 TO 5 CC MOUSSE
description: The LAKMÉ 9 TO 5 CC MOUSSE is a lightweight, color-correcting mousse that provides medium coverage for a natural, flawless finish.

name: 9TO5 PRIMER + MATTE LIPSTICK TRIO
description: The 9TO5 PRIMER + MATTE LIPSTICK TRIO is a set of three highly pigmented, velvety matte lipsticks that come with a primer to ensure a long-lasting and flawless application.

name: REFRESH & GLOW KIT
description: The REFRESH & GLOW KIT is a skincare set designed to revitalize and brighten your complexion. It includes a gentle cleansing foam, a hydrating toner, and a brightening serum.

name: LAKMÉ ABSOLUTE SPOTLIGHT EYESHADOW PALETTE
description: The Lakmé Absolute Spotlight Eyeshadow Palette is a versatile and high-quality eyeshadow palette that features 9 stunning shades with a mix of matte, shimmer, and metallic finishes.

name: LAKMÉ 4 STEP GLOWING SKIN COMBO
description: The Lakmé 4 Step Glowing Skin Combo is a complete skincare routine that includes a face wash, scrub, mask, and moisturizer.

name: 9TO5 PRIMER + MATTE LIPSTICK TRIO
description: The 9TO5 PRIMER + MATTE LIPSTICK TRIO is a set of three highly pigmented, velvety matte lipsticks that come with a primer to ensure a long-lasting and flawless application. The set includes three shades that are perfect for everyday wear and are enriched with vitamin E to keep your lips moisturized and nourished. The lipsticks are also transfer-resistant, preventing smudging or transfer onto clothes or surfaces.

name: REFRESH & GLOW KIT
description: The REFRESH & GLOW KIT is a skincare set designed to revitalize and brighten your complexion. It includes a gentle cleansing foam, a hydrating toner, and a brightening serum. The products are formulated with natural ingredients like lemon, green tea, and vitamin C to help even out skin tone, reduce dark spots, and improve skin texture. The kit is suitable for all skin types and is ideal for those who want to achieve a radiant and refreshed look.
